text: Murphy's Romance is a 1985 American romantic comedy movie directed by Martin Ritt and is based on the 1980 novella by Max Schott. It stars James Garner, Sally Field, Corey Haim, Brian Kerwin, Carole King, Anna Levine. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures and was nominated for two Oscars. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1985 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Martin Ritt Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Arizona
title: Murphy's Romance
